description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 11,205 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 3.4 million Fire damage to your primary target and 278,785 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)
